title: Pixel 2 camera crash and the flash light function is gone. Other app functions has gone too.
content:
Have done tried the troubleshooting with "Fix problems with your camera on Pixel phone" and reset to factory setting and the problem is still there.
Some app has broken too such as Youtube/Instagram/Facebook.
Notice my len keep moving and continuous making ticking sound.
Any idea with this problem?

This is a replacement from the US, I live in Taiwan.
All the team here just ask me to send it back to US for another replacement.
The shipment fee and the tax can almost get a new one so I'm not going to do that again.
